page.title: 10Holy Trinity Church _cont.
page.content: squad of men set to work on the {restoration work,}repointing,cutting back defects & where necessary using plastic stone.{Water repellent {solution}was then sprayed on the clean exterior stonework of the whole building. The whole cleaning process should keep the church looking clean for the {next 75 years. { The same company}are also stripping the roof off the church,refelting it & reslating it with approximately{10,000 {new slates.}This work will last{100 {years. {The Church}occupies a prime {position}on the west of the town in {Chapel Street (pic 3)}& can be seen from a distance of{7 miles.
